Row.Text: [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime is the consequence of your city's development. As your infrastructure expands, so too will the people looking to exploit it![NEWLINE]As Crime increases, certain parts to your city's yield output will be affected.[NEWLINE]------------------{1_CrimeBreakdown}{2_CrimePercents}[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime Total[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime is the consequence of your city's development. As your infrastructure expands, so too will the people looking to exploit it! As Crime increases, certain parts to your city's yield output will be affected.[NEWLINE]------------------{1_CrimeBreakdown}[NEWLINE]No Crime[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]{2_Num} [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime Total[ENDCOLOR]

Are you sure you want to sell this building? You will receive {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and it will save you {2_Num} [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime per turn in maintenance. (Note: you may only sell one building per turn)

[ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME] Organized Crime is an advanced stage of Crime. As specific Crimes become dominant, they will become organized! When Organized Crime emerges, certain parts to your city's yield output will be affected.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME] Threshold: {3_Color}{1_Threshold}%[ENDCOLOR]{2_OrganizedCrimeBreakdown}[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME] Organized Crime will not appear unless the city has reached [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]5[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_CITIZEN] Population.

[ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME] Organized Crime is an advanced stage of Crime. As specific Crimes become dominant, they will become organized! When Organized Crime emerges, certain parts to your city's yield output will be affected.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME]Threshold: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_Threshold}%[ENDCOLOR]

Because {1_IconString} {2_CrimeDesc} and {3_IconString} {4_CrimeDesc} exceed {5_Num}% in this city, {6_IconString} {7_OrganizedCrimeDesc} increase the city's [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime by {8_Num}%![NEWLINE]{9_Buildings}
Because {1_IconString} {2_CrimeDesc} and {3_IconString} {4_CrimeDesc} exceed {5_Num}% in this city, {6_IconString} {7_OrganizedCrimeDesc} decrease the city's [ICON_JFD_BLUE_FIST] Loyalty by {8_Num}%!
{1_Icon} {2_Desc} Loss from [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLACK] Crime now exceeds [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_Num}[ENDCOLOR] in {4_CityDesc}!
As [ICON_JFD_CRIME_RED] Treason and [ICON_JFD_CRIME_PURPLE] Vandalism exceed 50% in {1_City}, [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME_ANARCHISTS] Anarchists have emerged!
As [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BLUE] Fraud and [ICON_JFD_CRIME_WHITE] Heresy exceed 50% in {1_City}, [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME_COUNTERFEITERS] Counterfeiters have emerged!
As [ICON_JFD_CRIME_YELLOW] Corruption and [ICON_JFD_CRIME_ORANGE] Theft exceed 50% in {1_City}, [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME_MAFIA] Mafia have emerged!
As [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BROWN] Abduction and [ICON_JFD_CRIME_GREEN] Violence exceed 50% in {1_City}, [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME_SABOTEURS] Saboteurs have emerged!
As [ICON_JFD_CRIME_BROWN] Abduction and [ICON_JFD_CRIME_GREEN] Violence exceed 50% in {1_City}, [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME_TERRORISTS] Terrorists have emerged!
The Cities We All Like to Avoid
